title: Radiant Raasi Floral Necklace Set with Matching Jhumkis
materials: Base metal alloy layered with Silver & Rose Gold Hyderabadi Polish
features: Intricate floral design with a modern aesthetic. Features a geometric collar with flower motifs and delicate spherical droplets. The earrings mirror the necklace's design, creating a harmonious set. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting luster.
colors: Silver and Rose Gold with clear Cubic Zirconia stones.
occasions: and other special celebrations. Can also be paired with Indo-Western outfits for a sophisticated touch. Suited for modern brides and those seeking a blend of tradition and contemporary design.
description: A stunning statement piece showcasing a unique fusion of traditional craftsmanship and modern design. The meticulously crafted floral design, combined with the lustrous Hyderabadi polish, ensures a radiant and eye-catching appearance. The use of high-quality AAA Grade Cubic Zirconia offers a brilliant sparkle, while the lightweight construction guarantees comfortable wear throughout the day. A contemporary twist on classic Indian jewelry, this set makes a memorable addition to any jewelry collection.
